segments.text: How do you want to advertise the opening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've had good responses from the Beijing Times , help-wanted ads .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I suggest posting the ad Monday through Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Monday is the big day for job ads .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And job seekers will certainly check the paper over on Tuesday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's post on the Internet , too . Will get a better response . I'll post the ads . I know some good sites .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Such concern for the company , Craig ! I'm impressed .
segments.speaker: S1
